sentences.en: A lot of the talk was apparently vague and general.
sentences.cn: 很多话明显是些含糊的泛泛之论。

sentences.en: Apparently the company is losing a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 据说该公司目前亏损很大。

sentences.en: Apparently the girls are not at all amused by the whole business.
sentences.cn: 据说女孩们觉得整件事情一点也不好笑。

sentences.en: Apparently, well known actors were at these filthy parties.
sentences.cn: 听说有些知名演员也参加了这些下流的聚会。

sentences.en: But apparently this is only an illusion.
sentences.cn: 但显然这只是一个错觉。

sentences.en: But if you were so inclined, apparently all you have to do work on the railroad.
sentences.cn: 不过，如果你有这种想法的话，显然你所需要做的就是——去铁路局工作。

sentences.en: By Monday, Senor Menem had returned, apparently fired with new determination.
sentences.cn: 到星期一时梅嫩先生已经回来了，显然他又燃起了新的决心。

sentences.en: Dr Dunn was apparently trying to get away when he was shot.
sentences.cn: 很显然，邓恩博士在遭枪击时正企图逃跑。

sentences.en: His love letters were hot stuff, apparently.
sentences.cn: 他的情书貌似写得很火辣。

sentences.en: I'm no longer the apparently eternally cheerful chappy he remembers.
sentences.cn: 我已经不是他记忆中那个似乎永远快乐无忧的人了。

sentences.en: It occurs in elderly men, apparently as part of the ageing process.
sentences.cn: 这种情况出现在老年人当中，显然是衰老过程的一部分。

sentences.en: Modern tennis rackets are now apparently 20 per cent lighter.
sentences.cn: 现代的网球拍据说比以前的轻20%。

sentences.en: Rudolph said no more. Apparently he was a man of few words.
sentences.cn: 鲁道夫没再说话。看来他是个寡言少语的人。

sentences.en: She turned to face him, her anger apparently gone.
sentences.cn: 她转过身面对着他，好像怒气已经消退了。

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital, apparently amnesiac and shocked.
sentences.cn: 她被送往医院，好像是受了惊吓出现了失忆。

sentences.en: She would apparently eat normally and then make herself sick.
sentences.cn: 她显然还会照吃不误，然后把自己吃到恶心。

sentences.en: The men apparently opened fire after they were challenged by a patrol.
sentences.cn: 显然，那些人是在受到一支巡逻队的盘问后开的火。

sentences.en: The news had apparently been aimed at stealing the thunder from his visit.
sentences.cn: 这篇新闻显然是在对他的访问作先声夺人的报道。

sentences.en: The recent deterioration has been caused by an apparently endless recession.
sentences.cn: 看似永无止境的经济衰退导致了最近的恶化。

sentences.en: Two of them died from apparently unrelated causes.
sentences.cn: 他们中的两个人死因明显不同。

words.tran_cn: 表面上看,可能地,可行地

trans.tran_en: according to the way someone looks or a situation appears, although you cannot be sure
